description: BlackBerry Express is a presentation app included on BlackBerry devices released after 2013. It allows users to create, show, and share presentations on their BlackBerry devices, in much the same way Microsoft PowerPoint allows PC users to create, show, and share presentations.

Presentations created by BlackBerry Express are saved as EXPRESS files. No other program can open EXPRESS files. Therefore, since BlackBerry Express is discontinued, you may have trouble opening your EXPRESS file and viewing the presentation it contains.
